entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
